HelpSteps.step1: Click on ‚ÄúEnquiries/Need help?‚Äù on your homepage.
HelpSteps.step2: To create new enquiries: Click 'Raise (Submit) Enquiry' ‚Üí Enter your enquiry ‚Üí Attach file (if needed, ‚â§5MB) ‚Üí Click 'Submit'.
HelpSteps.step3: To search: Type keywords in the search bar.
HelpSteps.step5: To view: Check enquiry cards for message/status/attachments.
HelpSteps.step6: To download files: Click üì• icon on enquiry cards.
HelpSteps.step7: To rate the solved enquiries: Click 'Rate' ‚Üí Select stars (1‚Äì5) ‚Üí Submit.
HelpSteps.step8: To track the status of the enquiry: Raised/Submitted (yellow) ‚Üí Under Review (blue) ‚Üí Solved (green).

auth.videoDescription: Watch this video for a step-by-step registration process.
auth.contactSupport: For further assistance, please contact our support team via email at üìß or by phone at ‚òé.

RegisterSteps.step1: Select your professional title (e.g., Dr., Prof.) from the drop-down menu.
RegisterSteps.step2: Enter your full name exactly as it appears on your official ID (first, middle, last).
RegisterSteps.step3: Choose your birth date from the calendar.
RegisterSteps.step4: Select your gender (Can be updated at any time).
RegisterSteps.step5: Provide a secure email for login.
RegisterSteps.step6: Create a strong password (8‚Äì16 chars, mixed case, symbol).
RegisterSteps.step7: Remember email and password to avoid being locked out.
RegisterSteps.step8: Add phone number (select country, enter digits only).
RegisterSteps.step9: Enter academic details (country, institution, department, role).
RegisterSteps.step10: Agree to data protection & terms of service.
RegisterSteps.step11: Submit registration & check email for confirmation.
RegisterSteps.step12: Access your homepage to complete your profile.

courses.error: Failed to load courses. Please try again.
courses.registration_failed: Failed to register. Please try again.
courses.no_token: No token found. Please log in.

HelpSteps.step1: Click on the ‚ÄúCourses‚Äù tab on your homepage.
HelpSteps.step2: Click "Register (Enroll) Now" on your selected course.
HelpSteps.step3: Under ‚ÄúAvailable Forms‚Äù click ‚ÄúRegister/Enroll‚Äù for the ‚ÄúRegister & Housing Form.‚Äù
HelpSteps.step4: Select Group (if applicable): Group A or B for session scheduling.
HelpSteps.step5: Select Registration Type: UG & PG Students, PhD Scholars under 30 years / Extra Subsidized / Subsidized / Online etc.
HelpSteps.step6: Category of Registration: Registration + Shared Apartment Accommodation / Only Registration.
HelpSteps.step7: Submit Required Documents: Upload ID/Proof (PDF/JPG/PNG, max 5MB).
HelpSteps.step9: Accept Terms & Conditions: Check mandatory agreement boxes.
HelpSteps.step10: You are now registered. You can click on the ‚ÄúDetails‚Äù button to check your details.
HelpSteps.step11: Click ‚ÄúPay amount‚Äù to pay for the registration.
HelpSteps.step12: Access Confirmation & Documents: View registration details.
HelpSteps.step13: Complete Payment: After registration, click "Pay Now" ‚Üí Pay using the link ‚Üí confirm payment.

webinar.login_to_register: Error: Please log in to register.

HelpSteps.step3: To search: Type the webinar title in the search bar.
HelpSteps.step4: To filter: Select 'All/Upcoming/Past' from the dropdown.
HelpSteps.step5: To register: Click 'Register Now' on the webinar cards.
HelpSteps.step6: To watch: Registered users will see 'Watch Webinar' button, click on this button.
HelpSteps.step7: For details: Click any card for full webinar information.

webinarDetails.login_to_register: Error: Please log in to register.

HelpSteps.step1: Click the profile tab (with the profile picture) on your homepage to modify your profile.
HelpSteps.step2: Click on the edit button to update or change any details.
HelpSteps.step3: Update your title (Mr./Ms./Dr./Prof.) from the dropdown menu.
HelpSteps.step4: Enter your legal first name (as written on your official documents).
HelpSteps.step5: Add your middle name (optional, if used professionally).
HelpSteps.step6: Enter your last name (as written on your official documents).
HelpSteps.step7: Edit your phone number (include country code, no spaces/symbols).
HelpSteps.step8: Adjust your date of birth (use the calendar or type in YYYY-MM-DD format).
HelpSteps.step9: Select country of residence from the dropdown menu.
HelpSteps.step10: Update the university (full official name, no abbreviations).
HelpSteps.step14: Upload a profile picture (JPG/PNG, max 5MB, 500x500px recommended).
HelpSteps.step15: Review the changes & click 'Update' (floppy icon) to save.
HelpSteps.step16: Wait for the ‚ÄúProfile updated successfully!‚Äù message.
